caller_intent: The caller (not Yolanda Pineda Lario) wants to pay insurance for Yolanda's car, which was stopped by police due to a discrepancy in the insurance records.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the policyholder's name (Yolanda Pineda Lario) and insurance carrier (Allstate).
Agent checked the active policy and identified listed vehicles (2004 Toyota, 1998 Ford, 2010 Acura).
Agent resolved the confusion about the 2010 Acura not appearing in the policy.
Agent offered to send insurance documents via text to the provided address (227 Kendall Drive, Winston Salem).
Agent processed a payment of $160.80 using a saved credit card (ending in 9828).
knowledge_required: Handling vehicle discrepancies in insurance records
Payment processing via saved credit card
summary: A caller contacted Allstate to resolve an issue where police stopped a 2010 Acura due to an apparent lack of insurance. The agent verified Yolanda Pineda Lario's active policy, clarified the vehicle discrepancy, sent documents via text, and processed a payment. The caller expressed satisfaction with the resolution.
